name: Gangster Kill: Shooting War
description:
Gangster Kill: Shooting War is big challenge for you to shoot the criminals and bank robbers. The most thrilling and first person criminal assault shooting mission. Impossible mission is to chase the criminals and arrest them from city.
Features:

Thrilling action packed police missions gameplay
Ultimate FPS game with Exotic guns & rifles
The most exciting, challenging and addictive game play.
Play as a police officer to shoot the bank robbers.
